resources.string: Move the writable tag and your phone close each other.
This program is still under development. Please report all issues and other wishes how to improve this software. Thanks.
Current known limitations:\n- Only supports Mifare Ultra Light tags\n
Copyright Sami Viitanen <alump@iki.fi> 2011, All rigths reserved.
This application allows you to write Bluetooth connectivity information to NFC tags. These tags can be then used for easy connecting between your Bluetooth devices and phone.
NFC does not seem to be enabled. You have to enable it manually. Tap OK to start settings. Return to this application with back after you are done.
Now please touch writable tag with your device.
Enable write protection of the tag
Bluetooth is now enabled by application to locate the bluetooth device. Bluetooth will be automatically disabled after query is done.
Your device does not support NFC
Please tap your tag with the phone
